alert.note: Alert for Morton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 9:16PM CDT until June 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Morton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 916 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Elkhart, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elkhart around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Wilburton and Rolla. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
